text:
FormatRecord code recently changed to handle unicode strings.  This change made 
it impossible for user defined strings to be set.  The following patch makes 
use of the supplied methods and adds some to use the unicode functionality.
creator: shawn.laubach@b1b.tinker.af.mil
shawn.laubach@b1b.tinker.af.mil
text:
Created attachment 3335
Patch to add functionality to FormatRecord and test case to ensure it doesn't disappear

creator: slaubach@apache.org
text: *** Bug 13617 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
